post_message: Disturbing surveillance video shows a young boy being slapped by a man and falling to the ground in a Bakersfield grocery store. Justin Whittington, 23, was taken into custody in connection with the incident after the video was posted on social media and went viral. He was being held on $1,000,000 bail. The boy was not seriously injured, authorities said. Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
